General.Name: Global Menkul Degerler AS
General.Description: Global Menkul Degerler Anonim Sirketi provides capital market brokerage services to individuals, financial institutions, and local and international investors in Turkey. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Global Menkul Degerler Anonim Sirketi operates as a subsidiary of GYH Danismanlik ve Yönetim Hizmetleri A.S.
General.Address: Agaoglu My Newwork, Barbaros Mah, Istanbul, Turkey, 34746
